author: James Freeman
title: Facebook’s 10,000 New Editors
text:
Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg didn’t testify at today’s Senate Judiciary hearing about how one of his former clients used data about the users of his product. It’s probably just as well for him given that the company reports that 200 other apps were also using data in ways Facebook users didn’t expect. Politicians on the other side of the Atlantic also have questions for Mr. Zuckerberg about privacy, and it seems that he’s going to speak to the European Union but not to a committee of the British parliament.
Facebook users...
